name: siel/acumulus-prestashop
description: Integrates PrestaShop with your Siel Acumulus online administration
comment1: We ought to add a require-dev for phpunit. However, PrestaShop has its own vendor folder with phpunit and php-parser in it
comment2: As these are used by the runtime, we cannot add our own version of these liraries as that will clash.
comment3: So just use PrestaShop's version of phpunit and let's hope tis compatible.
